content: I like those tips. I think setting specific, achievable goals and creating an accountability system will really help me stay motivated. I've been feeling stuck for a while, and I know I need to make some changes. I've been eating lunch alone at my desk every day, and it's started to feel like a routine. I'm hoping that by joining a meetup group and meeting new people, I can start to break out of my shell and make some positive changes in my life. Do you have any advice on how to stay connected with people after meeting them at a meetup or event?
